sentences.en: Eggplant alone can be prepared in at least forty different ways.
sentences.cn: 茄子至少可有40种不同的烹制方式.

sentences.en: Eggplant is good to health, rich in vitamins, minerals and carbohydrate.
sentences.cn: 茄子是一种健身蔬菜.它含丰富维生素 、 矿物质和碳水化合物.

sentences.en: However, eggplant and capsicums should be stored open in the crisper as they sweat if stored in plastic bags.
sentences.cn: 而茄子和辣椒应该敞开存放在新鲜蔬菜保存盒中，因为当它们存放在塑料袋里时会冒汗。

sentences.en: I said, "it is eggplant, olives and tomatoes.
sentences.cn: 我说， “这是茄子，橄榄和西红柿。

sentences.en: Is that why they call you Jimmy '' Eggplant up his butt " Desnappio?
sentences.cn: 是不是因为这个所以别人叫你杰米屁股上长茄子的 代斯那皮尔?

sentences.en: Mike: I have eggplant and tomatoes. What about you?
sentences.cn: 迈克: 我有茄子和西红柿. 你呢?

sentences.en: Mozzarella cheese, broccoli, grilled eggplant cornredsun - dried tomatoes and our tomato sauce.
sentences.cn: 莫扎里拉芝士 、 西兰花 、 烤茄子、意大利蕃茄干及秘制比萨酱.

sentences.en: Now you just alternate layers of that mixture and eggplant.
sentences.cn: 现在你只需把茄子和拌料一层层交替放好。

sentences.en: Other instruments include celeriac bongos , eggplant cymbals and pumpkin drums.
sentences.cn: 其他乐器还有块根芹手鼓 、 茄钹和南瓜鼓.

sentences.en: So did you make it with beef or eggplant?
sentences.cn: 那你是加牛肉还是茄子?

sentences.en: The invention discloses a method for breeding eggplant containing iodine.
sentences.cn: 本发明公开了一种含碘茄子的培育方法.

sentences.en: There are Chinese cabbage, spinage, and eggplant for your choice.
sentences.cn: 有卷心菜, 菠菜和茄子供您选择.

sentences.en: They will plant crops like collard greens, kale, tomatoes, lettuce and eggplant.
sentences.cn: 他们将种植农作物如:羽衣干蓝绿, 羽衣甘蓝, 西红柿, 生菜,茄子.

sentences.en: Two - thirds of the world's eggplant is grown in New Jersey.
sentences.cn: 全世界 三分之二 的茄子种在纽泽西?

sentences.en: Vegetariana Pizza used the tomato, capsicum, eggplant , zucchini, mushrooms as the topping.
sentences.cn: 素披萨铺上了一层可口的番茄 、 辣椒籽 、 茄子 、 还有蘑菇等.

sentences.en: We have vegetable too. Such as Broccoli, eggplant, carrot & radish.
sentences.cn: 我们也有蔬菜类, 如芥兰 、 茄子 、 红萝卜 和 白萝卜等.

trans.tran_en: a large vegetable with smooth purple skin
